headline: Ask HN: What should I bring up during salary negotiation as a junior developer?
description:
So i am a junior software developer in a large consultant company and have my first salary negotitations soon and need some help.

I was told all juniors would increase the same in a sort of collective way since some did not get the same chances when it came to projects and performance, however my boss said there was a small change they would consider giving a larger raise based on performance.

I have been lucky and got a very good project, as in I could show my strengths and it's a high value customer (within law enforcement). During the project i took a lot of initiative and responsibility, we were 3 developers working on it (2 seniors and me) and luckily one of them is my boss. The project is now being used by the customer and I am the only one maintaining the project and feeling I have taken even more responsibility than was expected.

The project was fairly large consisting of 2 frontends and one backend, where I made ~80% of both the frontends and did all the database work on the backend. To be honest being told that my performance wont impact my salary is kind of a bummer considering i have to wait another year for the next possible raise.

The project is now also being used as a reference to sell consultants to other customers and it has also garnered attention in nationwide news.

So my question to you is how should approach the salary negotiation and how should i present my case to my boss?

Sorry if this is incoherent, english is not my first language. Thanks.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 作为一名初级开发人员，我应该在薪酬谈判中提出什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 作為一名初級開發人員，我應該在薪酬談判中提出什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
我是一家大型咨询公司的初级软件开发人员，很快就要进行第一次薪资谈判，需要一些帮助。

我被告知所有初级人员将以一种集体的方式增加，因为在项目和业绩方面，有些人没有得到同样的机会，但是我的老板说有一个小变化，他们会考虑根据业绩给予更大的提升。在这个项目中，我发挥了很大的主动性和责任感，我们有三个开发人员在做这个项目（两个前辈和我），幸运的是其中一个是我的老板。这个项目现在被客户使用，我是唯一一个维护这个项目的人，我觉得自己承担了比预期更多的责任。

这个项目相当大，包括两个前端和一个后端，其中我做了大约80%的前端，并做了后端的所有数据库工作。说实话，被告知我的表现不会影响我的薪水，考虑到我必须再等一年才能得到下一次可能的加薪，这有点令人沮丧。

这个项目现在也被用作向其他客户推销顾问的参考，它也在全国性的新闻中获得了关注。

因此，我向你提问，应该如何对待薪水谈判，我应该如何向我的老板展示我的案例？

如果这不连贯，英语不是我的第一语言，请原谅。谢谢。
